title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When using StyledText in word wrap mode, appending N lines to the text results in N redraws of the entire client area. This is causing inefficient redraws.
EB: Ideally, there should be only one redraw for each visible line. To reproduce the issue, run the test case provided below:
SR:
- Open the application
- Enable word wrap mode in the StyledText component
- Append N lines to the text
- Observe the number of redraws and the performance impact
